TopicTitle: Crash On Returning to Space Center View

Articles.Content:
So. I have this issue where I return to the space center view and the game crashes. It happens randomly, and I can't figure out what it is. The crash has also occurred during the building of a craft and as I put a craft into orbit; these instances don't occur as often as the returning to space center crash.

I've taken the error report and output log and compiled them into a zip folder: http://www./download/8b241ht1vbuphas/KSP+Logs.zip

Any help would be greatly appreciated! Thank you!

You're running out of memory:

DynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocationCould not allocate memory: System out of memory!

Your options:

  • remove texture-heavy mods or parts of them such as B9, KWR, or NP
  • increase the ATM's scale factor (in KSP\GameData\ActiveTextureManagement\config.cfg)
  • use the -force-opengl command-line option (or this mod which does the same thing)
  • switch to Linux 64-bit

Also, welcome to the forums!

In the future, it will help to include all the information requested in the support stickies. Not all issues are so clear cut.
